title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Bailly Homestead & Chellberg Farm
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps     Bailly Homestead & Chellberg Farm                Bailly Homestead, Chellberg Farm, and Little Calumet Trail System        Costas Dillon, NPS Collection       Facility Hours Open Daily: 7:00 a.m. - 30 minutes past sunset  Parking for cars and buses Restrooms Information board listing current park activities  Street Address / Road Intersection Highway 20 & Mineral Springs Road Porter, IN 46304 GPS Coordinates 041.37.30N 087.05.15W       Trails Bailly Homestead, Chellberg Farm, and Little Calumet River Trails         Click image to view full trail map.        Visitor Activities  Hike to the Bailly Cemetery Explore the Bailly Homestead Stroll over to the Chellberg Farm Bike the Porter Brickyard Trail  Fun Facts  Only National Park System location that makes maple syrup Homestead of the first non-native Northwest Indiana resident
